channel.title: PG_Kelly tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from PG_Kelly.

item.description:
@thisisdanbell I really enjoyed your live streams last Fri/Sat.

Over here at https://t.co/0SLJGJYmuY we have our own Mastodon server at https://t.co/5p9ktAgrQn as well as one for the https://t.co/qYNrM06LpN project. You can find that Mastodon server at https://t.co/V0EkQpWjSo
item.source:markdown:
@thisisdanbell I really enjoyed your live streams last Fri/Sat.
Over here at https://t.co/0SLJGJYmuY we have our own Mastodon server at https://t.co/5p9ktAgrQn as well as one for the https://t.co/qYNrM06LpN project. You can find that Mastodon server at https://t.co/V0EkQpWjSo
